posts.post_content:
Donated to the OBC peeps.


Up for sale are four trimmed T205s. I assume the gold was harvested to make some beautiful jewelry :D

$25 (for the group). PayPal F/F shipped in PWE. Add $5.75 for regular paypal and usps tracking.

Not pretty but maybe some fun for you low grade set collectors

[url=https://ibb.co/1b29bqL][img]https://i.ibb.co/V3Bv3St/D937-C804-2-A8-A-407-D-8277-5-DCDA4301-EBB.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://ibb.co/4WBzHm4][img]https://i.ibb.co/Zdy50Lc/B587-E67-D-3276-4-B26-8-C14-FFD221-C88-E92.jpg[/img][/url]

I'll take those babies off your hands.  Somebody in OBC will give them a good home!

Take Care,
Geno
